document.full_text: fifty lots of unpublished photographs of the beatles' first u.s. concerts taken by a teenager in 1964 are expected to fetch about $100,000 when they are sold at auction, christie's said on friday.
document.title: early beatles photographs to be auctioned
lines_and_colors: fifty lots of unpublished photographs of the beatles' first u.s. concerts taken by a teenager in 1964 are expected to fetch about $100,000 when they are sold at auction, christie's said on friday.
